prompt: A hyperrealistic portrait of Potato Fascism Chan, a cute and kawaii 19-year-old girl with long, messy brown hair (long brown messy hair:1.2) and bright green eyes (bright green eyes:1.1).  She wears deranged clothing (deranged clothing:1.3) featuring a potato armband (potato armband:1.2), farming shoes (farming shoes:1.1), and carries a pitchfork (pitchfork:1.1) and a potato knife (potato knife:1.0).  Her expression is a mix of unhinged craziness (unhinged craziness:1.3) and sweet cuteness (sweet cuteness:1.2),  a whimsical juxtaposition.  The background is a small town, Spudopolis (Spudopolis:0.9), with fields of potatoes (potato fields:0.8) visible in the distance.  She's surprisingly clean (surprisingly clean:1.0) and smells faintly of potatoes (potato scent:0.8).  The overall style is photorealistic, with a slightly surreal and whimsical touch to emphasize her unique personality. (photorealistic:1.4), (whimsical:1.0)
